New Records: Derrick White scored 23 points, Jayson Tatum and Payton Pritchard each scored 20 points, and the Celtics extended their winning streak to three games
Key Match Events: The Celtics scored the first 11 points of the fourth quarter to increase their lead to 93-72
Derrick White, Kristaps Porzingis, and Payton Pritchard made key threes during the fourth quarter
Post-Match Reflections: Jalen Green had 27 points for the Rockets
The Rockets lost for the third time in four games
Miscellaneous Highlights: Boston led by 21 points with about 4:30 to go
Porzingis added 11 points with five rebounds in his return
